Package items

Class Upgrade

java.lang.Object
items.Item
items.Upgrade
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cannon, Sail
public abstract class Upgrade
extends Item
Superclass for all items which give the ship an advantage, e.g. cannons
Author:
Andrew Hall

  • Constructor Details

    • Upgrade

      public Upgrade​(java.lang.String name, int baseValue)
      The basic constructor of an item. Likely the version used in shops.
      Parameters:
      name - The item's name (Food, wool...)
      baseValue - The item's base value

    • Upgrade

      public Upgrade​(java.lang.String name, int baseValue, int purchasedPrice, java.lang.String purchasedFrom)
      A more detailed constructor, used for purchased items. Gives info on how much it cost, and where it was purchased.
      Probably used by copiers
      Parameters:
      name - The item's name (Food, wool...)
      baseValue - The item's base value
      purchasedPrice - How much it was bought for
      purchasedFrom - The name of the island it was bought from
